https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yvPmsEYxDLmosWcalo9zW2i3RqD.jpg A dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the gold-digging girl who inspires him to try to get it together. American Loser
